Package edu.monash.fit2099.demo.conwayslife

Interface Behaviour

  • public interface Behaviour

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      Action getAction​(Actor actor, GameMap map)
      A factory for creating actions.

    • Method Detail

      • getAction

        Action getAction​(Actor actor,
                 GameMap map)
        A factory for creating actions. Chaining these together can result in an actor performing more complex tasks. The idea of a Behaviour is that you can put AI code in one to perform specific tasks, such as moving toward or running away from something, attacking, etc. Then, you can have logic within an Actor's playTurn() method that determines which Behaviour to perform. This allows the behaviour's logic to be reused in other Actors via delegation instead of inheritance. Behaviours arer purely optional. If you like, you can simply create the appropriate Action within playTurn() and return it. This may be the better option of you
        Parameters:
        actor - the Actor performing the action
        map - the GameMap where the action is taking place
        Returns:
        an Action that actor can perform, or null if actor can't follow this behaviour right now.
        See Also:
        Actor.playTurn(Actions, Action, GameMap, Display)
